# passwork Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "passwork" {
  host    = "https://my-passwork-instance.com/api/v4"
  api_key = "my-api-key"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `host` (String)
